Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Wand = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true local vCharacter
local giggle local wandAOE = Vector3.new(15.0, 15.0, 15.0)
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if myTorso == nil then print("Torso not found") return end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
giggle = Tool:FindFirstChild("Giggle") if giggle then giggle:Play() end
wait(0.6)
parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - wandAOE, myTorso.Position + wandAOE), vCharacter, 100)
for i = 1, #parts do tempChar = parts[i].Parent tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if tempHumanoid then clown = tempHumanoid:FindFirstChild("Clowned") if clown == nil then newScript = Tool.ClownedScript:Clone() newScript.Parent = tempChar newScript.Disabled = false
clown = Instance.new("StringValue") clown.Name = "Clowned" clown.Value = "CLOWN" clown.Parent = tempHumanoid break end end end
wait(4.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if giggle then giggle:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent
-- Animations local wandAnim
function onActivatedL() vCharacter = Tool.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
if Tool.Enabled then wandAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.WandAnim) if wandAnim then wandAnim:Play() end end end
function onEquippedL() end
function onUnequippedL() if wandAnim then wandAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedL) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedL) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedL)

vCharacter = script.Parent humanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local insertTable = {} local headTable = {} local torsoTable = {}
-- Storing the current attire to reset back after 10 seconds local charChildren = vCharacter:GetChildren() for c = 1, #charChildren do if charChildren[c].className ~= "Part" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Script" and charChildren[c].className ~= "LocalScript" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Humanoid" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Tool" and charChildren[c].className ~= "ForceField" then clone = charChildren[c]:Clone() table.insert(insertTable, clone) end if charChildren[c].Name == "Head" then headChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" or headChildren[a].className == "SpecialMesh" then clone = headChildren[a]:Clone() table.insert(headTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then clone = torsoChildren[x]:Clone() table.insert(torsoTable, clone) end end end end
-- Removing the current attire local graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" and graphics[j].className ~= "ForceField" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" then --or headChildren[a].className == "SpecialMesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end if graphics[j].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then torsoChildren[x]:Remove() end end end end
local hats = { game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(1032641), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(40893248), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(37208763), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(1031418), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(11721354), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(13844687), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(20573078) }
--vCharacter.Head.Transparency = 1
face = vCharacter.Head:FindFirstChild("face") if face ~= nil then face.Parent = nil end
num = math.random(1, #hats) hat = hats[num]
ch = hat:GetChildren() if hat == nil then return end hat = hat:GetChildren() if hat ~= nil then hat = hat[1] end if hat ~= nil then --hat.Handle.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,2.5) hat.Handle.CanCollide = true hat.Parent = vCharacter end
decals = { game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(42070576), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27134344), game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(29348122) } num = math.random(1, #decals) decal = decals[num] decal = decal:GetChildren() if decal then decal = decal[1] end if decal then decal.Parent = vCharacter.Head end
chance = math.random(0, 1) local body = nil if chance == 1 then body = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(48474356) end
if body then girlBody = body:GetChildren() end if girlBody ~= nil then girlBody = girlBody[1] end
if girlBody ~= nil then girlBody.Parent = vCharacter end
wait(10)
-- Resorting the old attire
if insertTable ~= nil then if morphResetSound then morphResetSound:Play() end graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" then --or headChildren[a].className == "SpecialMesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end if graphics[j].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then torsoChildren[x]:Remove() end end end end
for i =1, #insertTable do clone = insertTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter end for k = 1, #headTable do clone = headTable[k]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Head") end for l = 1, #torsoTable do clone = torsoTable[l]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end end
wait(1.0) humanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then clown = humanoid:FindFirstChild("Clowned") clown:Remove() end script:Remove()
